ja356:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja356:1.1_0: “You dwell in the wilderness, in the forest grove,
ja356:1.3_0: again and again, oppressing and intimidating;
ja356:3.1_0: “One who wants to harm living beings
ja356:3.3_0: I believe in to be no one burning!

ja356:4.4_0: they won’t have the view in your name.”
ja356:5.4_0: to give what has been done by people.”
